title: About Veselka
welcome: Welcome to Veselka - the easiest way to create a color scheme for your project. Don't expect too much. It's simple, primitive, and can't do much. All for making the process easy and fast.
veselka_is_different: There are a lot of outstanding services for creating fantastic, thoughtful color schemes for professional UX designers. Veselka is different. Veselka is for others. Using Veselka, you can create a unique color schema for your project in seconds. Without being a professional UX designer.

why.title: Why do you need it?
list: Because you want a unique look for your app
Because you don't want to spend much time on it
why.explain: I created Veselka thinking about project prototypes. For freshly bootstrapped projects using your favorite template.

possibilities.title: Using Veselka, you can
list: Create a truly unique color scheme
See the full preview of your scheme
Set a name for any color if you prefer it over the default one
